definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: A quantitative analysis of the variation pattern of characters of the Viola variegata complex.
sentences.chinese: 斑叶堇菜种宗性状变异式样的定量分析。

sentences.english: In addition, the semi-quantitative analysis by VIDAS image analysis system were carried either.
sentences.chinese: 并用VIDAS图象分析系统进行半定量分析。

sentences.english: The methods of qualitative and quantitative analysis of the phospholipids are established.
sentences.chinese: 磷脂色谱定性及定量分析方法的建立。

sentences.english: HPLC method for quantitative analysis of abamectin using normal phase HPLC was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 研究了高效液相色谱法定量分析阿维菌素方法。

sentences.english: GC quantitative analysis method is established for pentafluoroethyl iodide analysis.
sentences.chinese: 建立了五氟碘乙烷进行气相色谱定量分析方法。

sentences.english: This method can be used for quantitative analysis of the alkyl amido phosphate ester.
sentences.chinese: 该法可用于烷基酰胺磷酸酯的定量分析。

sentences.english: The saturation voltage of the multiunit tubes is also quantitatively analysed.
sentences.chinese: 还定量分析了复合管的饱和压降。

sentences.english: It is necessary to quantitative analysis to identify the performance of model-following system.
sentences.chinese: 通过定量分析评估所设计的模型跟踪系统的性能。

sentences.english: But article on Aperiodic ticket in quantitative analysis is few.
sentences.chinese: 但是目前关于这方面定量分析的论文很少。

sentences.english: The phase jitter of output signal of the PLL( phase locked loop) frequency doubler is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 定量分析了数字式锁相倍频器输出信号的相位抖动。

sentences.english: Second, this dissertation develops the qualitative and quantitative analysis methods for cogging torque.
sentences.chinese: 其次，本文发展了齿槽力矩的定性和定量分析方法。

sentences.english: Images were compared by visual and semi-quantitative analyses.
sentences.chinese: 用目测和半定量分析判断图像结果。

sentences.english: It introduces precise quantitative analysis of total sulfur content in synthetic gas.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了合成气中总硫含量的精确定量分析方法。

sentences.english: Result The chromatograms and the data of quantitative analysis were attained.
sentences.chinese: 结果得到了样品的色谱图和定量分析数据。

sentences.english: A method was developed for the quantitative analysis of organic acids in Actinidia chinensis by GC.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用气相色谱定量分析了猕猴桃中有机酸含量。

sentences.english: These 21 tumors were all considered as benign by visual method and semiquantitative analysis.
sentences.chinese: 这21例肿瘤全部被目测法与半定量分析判断为良性。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
